## Introduction

Making a different chnage

This web page will provide metadata information about the data files
used for the course Introduction to R, databases and reproducibility for
AMR epidemiologists.

### Data files:

#### Gapminder files:

-   gapminder_data.csv

-   gapminder_wide.csv

#### Epidemiology files:

-   hgt_wgt.csv

-   icd10_data.csv

-   dig_health_hub_amr_v2.csv

-   additional data set

## Gapminder files overview

### gapminder_data.csv

This data set consists of 6 variables and 1704 data points.

| Variable name | Data type |
|---------------|-----------|
| country       | text      |
| year          | date/time |
| pop           | number    |
| continent     | text      |
| lifeExp       | number    |
| gdpPerCap     | number    |
